# python新员工教材 楚广明 2012

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-2012
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-2012
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-2012
python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-2012 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-erlingyier
python-xin-yuangong-jiaocai-chu-guangming-erlingyier <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
